title: Ep117: Royal Norfolk Regiment - Battle of Kohima Part 3
itunes:title: Ep117: Royal Norfolk Regiment - Battle of Kohima Part 3
description:
Pete and Gary continue the gruelling tale of the Royal Norfolk Regiment and their involvement in the horrendous Battle of Kohima in World War 2.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki


Become a member to listen ad-free for only £2 per month: https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history
